title: Swain Voice Line Suggestions.

replies.body:
{{champion:55}} : "Don't make me shorten your leash, little girl."
{{champion:91}} : "You would do well in remembering who your master served."
Nice.
**frantically scribbles notes* *

Please, please put an Edgar Allan Poe reference somewhere in there.

And PLEASE, make Beatrice say things.

Don't worry, I saw your post. :D

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/MWBIxouw-i-hope-post-vgu-swain-is-still-full-of-edgar-allan-poe-and-literary-references

Quoth the Raven nevermore.

_~~blushes under layers of unnaturally white makeup ~~_

Thank you! What other (book or otherwise) references are you considering writing in there?

Unfortunately, talking about inspirations sometimes gets us into trouble, since everyone wants to protect the [SAGAS](https://kotaku.com/why-the-ridiculous-candy-crush-vs-banner-saga-conflict-1507064357) and [SCROLLS](https://www.forbes.com/sites/alexknapp/2012/03/16/bethesda-and-mojang-settle-scrolls-lawsuit/#23cb180f7e35) of their IPs... {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}  My favorite references are always the legacy lines that we either reuse or tweak. I'm five steps ahead of you there. 

Oh, there's also a Nietzsche reference!

> Oh, there's also a Nietzsche reference!

His nihilist period or his later, creative one? 

I think the dancing star quote from Zarathustra was the motto of my youth, probably still among my favourite. 

But something tells me Swain will either speak about overcoming his nature or the what doesn't kill you makes you stronger quote? 

On a side note, which philosophy does his Noxus mostly subscribe to?

I might have to leave that answer to his VO, bio, and your much-appreciated patience. Sorry about that.

I've actually never heard the dancing star quote before. It reminds me of my time as a young lad in Zaun. :D Watching Warwick and Urgot, and finding freedom in being afraid.

"I say unto you: one must still have chaos in oneself to be able to give birth to a dancing star. I say unto you: you still have chaos in yourselves."

I interpret it in two ways, which can reflect two different sides of Nietzsche's work:

1) On one had he says that to create something remarkable you have to tap into your primal and uncivilized size. This is I feel a reflection of his "Birth of Tragedy" days where he theorized about the Apollonian and Dionysian dichotomy.

2) The other, is indeed, that there is a bit of self-destructive suffering and anxiety in transcending your limitations. Sort of like in Chuck Palahniuk's "Diary" (which is my favorite book of his and I probably associate them because I read him during my Nietzsche phase). Of course the role of suffering is discussed throughout the existentialism movement and so naturally permeates Nietzsche's work.

I really can't wait for Noxus, it represents the aspects of European culture that are very dear to me, and of course the aesthetics appeal to my nostalgia a bit too much. Working on Swain (and the rest of his court) must be a treat.
There's no chance the rework is on the PBE before you guys go on holiday break is there?

I'll put it this way. There's a greater chance of him appearing before break, than there is of me confirming a release window or PBE date, lol. {{sticker:sg-ezreal}} In fact, don't listen to anyone who gives you a date (unless you're next to Reav3 in a bar, and you bought him a lot of drinks). We're still working really hard on Swain!! He's coming though! SWAIN TRAIN!

Edit: fixed the spelling of bossman's name

Isn't that really expensive? Sounds like Riot pays well. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
{{sticker:sg-jinx}} A Riot-Senpai has noticed me!
https://imgur.com/a/cJEK4

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/HwHH4UfP-swain-the-arch-fiend

This was my Swain rework idea, I know u guys got the stuff ur doing now, but here is some ideas? Inspiration maybe?
Ok I absolutely love the LB one {{sticker:leblanc-funny}}
{{champion:133}} : "My bird will eat whats left of yours!"

To {{champion:60}} "Who wins a fight ? The raven or the spider ?... Dont tell me, you're already under my shoe."
To {{champion:69}} "Your greed and your naivete have betrayed you, serpent."
To {{champion:9}} "Even the crows don't fear a scarecrow like you, useless"
To {{champion:28}} "Your charms have taken so many lives but you're the least attractive creature I've ever seen"
To {{champion:3}} "Have you account all the people you crushed each time you woke up ? No ? You might be a good ally."
To {{champion:143}} "I always hated flowers, but after seeing you, I hate them even more... "

You should know that the name Swain, means like gentlemen who seduces.

So I feel he'd have a way with the ladies, like he does with leblanc, he might say something nicer to zyra.

But what you said about what he said to evelynn was spot on.

"Do what you will, but I will not fall to the likes of you" Taunting yasuo 
"Your words mean nothing,until it is used"-Taunting rammus 
"Betrayal is nothing more than an exit slip"Taunting An exiled champion ie.Yasuo,Riven etc.

Just came up with these
I like the Yasuo and Rammus ones. The last one doesn't really fit into what we know. Other 2 suggestions are nice, though!
The last one was random tbh
Dear...Riot?Pls I want Swain rework now!
Patience. Have patience, good sir.

I think it's a tad preemptive to be thinking up voice lines when we don't know how his lore will change. After all, what we know is that somehow he now has Vastayan blood in his veins, according to Rakan/Xayah's taunts to him. 

That being said, what we know currently of his relationship with LeBlanc is that it's love hate. Both are vying for control of Noxus, so I don't think he'd be as amicable to her. He would want to root out the Black Rose so he would have absolute control, because I don't see Swain being okay with being a puppet for the cult.

Also, your Lee Sin line doesn't make sense.
It's a reference to another show. Lee's voice actor, Vic Migogna, plays a character named Qrow. Thus, the joke that only certain people will get.

That's a reference that is INCREDIBLY niche. That much niche in a reference makes it a bad reference. First of all, there's no listing for the voice actors, so most League players wouldn't get it. Making a joke only like 3 people get isn't classy. You have to appeal to an uncommon audience, not a completely rare one.
Good point.

RWBY?

Is that why I thought I fucking knew that god damn voice?
Yup. You can really hear it in God Fist voice.

Really? I didn't knew that. 
Does that mean that the {{champion:64}} x {{champion:127}} has shipped away?
I mean their both blind...I ship it.

I hope the vastayan crap is rakan and xay mistaken.

I prefer him as a fiend. (demon)

_"In the end I don't care whether you love me or hate me, just as long as I win."
"Of all the things I hold in high regard, rules is not one of them."
"You build your future, it isn't handed to you."_
_"You are entitled to nothing."_

_"I'm ~~gonna~~ going to offer you a choice: Do you want a empty life, or a meaningful death?"_

I'm sure there are other good quotes that could be adapted but these are the ones that come to my mind at the moment.
Use "will" instead of "gonna". Using gonna, it sounds like Jinx or Ekko.

It's the direct quote from The Mandarin, was just copying the phrase. I also like the idea that Swain could mock Demacian ideals like how Mandarin did to American ideals.

FYI the other quotes are all Frank Underwood.
I'm pretty sure he's already been voice acted. Those are pretty good though, but I think he'd compliment LeBlanc's brilliance rather than her looks.
Maybe. I wanted to have some voice line making some sort of Black Rose reference/pun.

I'd love it if Swain still was a fan of Sona's music!! Silly things like that are what attracts me to the character. Also definitely don't forget to have him say a few choice words to gangplank for sinking the Noxian warship "the Leviathan". So {{champion:37}} and {{champion:41}} !!!

{{champion:37}} : "You are my biggest fan! Wait, that wasn't right."
{{champion:41}} : "I have to say your feat impressed me. That's why you have one chance to surrender. Once."
{{sticker:leblanc-funny}}
